mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbStudent (create_at, name, qq, type, city, enter_at, school, online_id, link, desire, bro, update_at, know_from ) VALUES (#{create_at}, #{name}, #{qq}, #{type}, #{city}, #{enter_at}, #{school}, #{online_id}, #{link}, #{desire}, #{bro}, #{update_at}, #{know_from})
mapper.update: UPDATE tbStudent SET create_at=#{create_at}, name=#{name}, qq=#{qq}, type=#{type}, city=#{city}, enter_at=#{enter_at}, school=#{school}, online_id=#{online_id}, link=#{link}, desire=#{desire}, bro=#{bro}, update_at=#{update_at}, know_from=#{know_from} WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tbStudent WHERE name LIKE #{name}
